description:
From illusory walls, hidden bridges, and using gestures - there is plenty to find in Elden Ring's DLC.

---SPOILERS BELOW---

0:00 - Intro
0:26 - A Hornsent Gift
1:42 - Fog Rift Catacombs
2:33 - Dry Leaf Dane
3:03 - Ash of War: Carian Sovereignty
3:52 - Shadow Keep Illusory Walls
5:14 - Armored Furnace Golems
6:34 - Entering the Ruins of Unte
7:21 - Stone-Sheathed Sword
8:14 - Sword of Light & Darkness
9:10 - Miquella's Great Rune
12:03 - St. Trina's Dialogue
13:19 - Spirit Ash of Jolan and Anna
15:00 - Outro

#eldenring #shadowoftheerdtree #gamespot
title: 12 Things You Didn’t Know in Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree DLC
